Just downloaded and installed the game but it asks me for disk2 on start-up, hmmm? Any takers for how to resolve this? Thanks
Hoppas det fungerar rätt, i så fall, tack så mycket!
This is missing disk 2? I cant seem to locate it.

1) Go to "program files" then "robin hood dotc". Rename "dotc" app, I renamed to "dotc1".

2) Go to where you saved the download. Go to "crack". Copy "dotc" app and paste in "program files - robin hood dotc" Open the newly saved "dotc" app.

It worked for me. Don't like the game though.

Enjoy

1) Go to "program files" then "robin hood dotc". Rename "dotc" app, I renamed to "dotc1".

2) Go to where you saved the download. Go to "crack". Copy "dotc" app and paste in "program files - robin hood dotc" Open the newly saved "dotc" app.

It worked for me. Don't like the game though.

Enjoy
